::Lilly::
"Moon Cutter." Lilly slings a golden crescent moon at the two missiles over 
Liono.

::Liono::
"Thanks" Liono get hit by the blast marring his armor. Liono slides out of 
the way of some of the shots getting hit by 12 his armor taking most of the 
damage as he growls. "Fire Rockets!" Shoots one rocket at the Blade Missile. 
Aims at Demon Wulf and Dark Claw gets a lock fires 15 Fire Rockets at 
DemonWulf and 10 at Dark Claw.(( Fire Rockets are a little stronger than 
fireballs and explosive I.E. Mini meteors))

::Neo Bahamut::
Neo Growls as the E.M.P. hits him and explodes his armor burns switches 
lancer ports Shoots one Ice lancer at the ground as it spreads trying to 
give Refector a nice slip and side. Neo Focus breathes in deep and Fires a 
cone of Acid at Flesh Ripper this time keeping it steady. Fires the rest of 
the 8 exploding lancers at Flesh Ripper.

::Dark::
Dark Looks at the missiles "This is going to hurt!"  Fires one blast taking 
out one of two missiles.

::?4::
"Not on my watch." Fire a  bolt at the missile saving dark.

::Dark::
"Hey one Wing Thanks" as the back blast burns Dark as it stings. Dark aims 
at Chaos and Fires 25 Dark Plasma Shots.

::?4::
Tigerhawk2 aims a garnet at Minion and fires 25 Lighting Bolts at Minion.

::Koj::
Koj getting hit by the Black Orb flies back a few feet his armor brunt. His 
Tekno armor already being repairs as some of the small wounds start closing. 
Koj Throws the Fang at the purple and sends two chain to retrieve it. "Tekno 
Power Blasters." Koj�s Chest, Shoulder Plates, Arms, Legs, all the Plates 
open to Reveal Tekno Crystals. His right half fires 14 Tekno enhanced Fusion 
shots at Minion while his left half fires 11 more at Chaos then Koj closes 
his armor.

::Lilly::
Lilly watches the fang devour the purple panics a little as 10 of 25 blast 
hit her armor marred as it starts t give.

::Tiamat::
The rest of 25 hit Tiamat as she growls standing in front of Lilly. "Are you 
alright master. Sorry it took so long for me to awaken" Tiamat is Black and 
purple dragon Lilly�s Dragon as she retracks heat shielding. "My turn." 
Breathes a massive cone Plasma at Chaos.

::Lilly::
"About time Tiamat its ok you made it that�s what counts." Lilly Points her 
left arm at Demon Wulf as the Two scythes like wing extend as it enters long 
bow mode a quiver roll out of a back port. Lilly grabs a hand full of High 
Power exploding enegry arrows. She Fires 10 swift shots at Demon Wulf.
